page.title: 18INFORMATION SYSTEMS WOK'HAM
page.content: Recently established in the region is the{UK Headquarters}of a large U S Electronics firm(Hewlett-Packard); their {world centre for software {development. }Here work around 300 people,one third of them women,{skilled and unskilled,}earning from Â£5000 up Â£18000 a year. The company has an extensive selection of {software and peripherals. }70% of the workers live locally. Some are transported by the company mini-bus. Subsidised luncheons are available from a{canteen}run by a big national catering company. Drink machines vending tea, coffee and milk are provided. There is a{social club, bar, squash and tennis courts. The building stands in 10 acres of land-scaped grounds.
